Package tier2.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Tier2MovieCreatorController
    This class starts the server in a thread
    Tier2MovieCreatorServer
    Class used to listen for connections from clients.
    Tier2MovieCreatorThreadHandler
    Class that handles the communication and flow of data from the client
    Tier2MovieManagerController  
    Tier2MovieManagerServer  
    Tier2MovieManagerThreadHandler  
    Tier2MovieSchedulerController
    The class that injects the view and starts the server
    Tier2MovieSchedulerServer
    That class that waits for the client to connect and get handled by the Thread Handler
    Tier2MovieSchedulerThreadHandler
    The class that handles the response to the client's requests
